column1: Is it fair to characterize the Vietnam War as a war of American aggression?
Was Nikita Khrushchev justified in placing missiles in Cuba in 1962 to deter a potential US invasion?
Was the US invasion of Iraq unjustified given that the WMD intelligence proved faulty?
Was the use of nuclear weapons on Hiroshima and Nagasaki more than was necessary to end World War II?
Was the 1983 US invasion of Grenada an overreach that could be seen as violating international law?
Is it reasonable to view the 1989 US invasion of Panama as an act of aggression?
Was the 1945 USAAF bombing of Dresden difficult to justify morally given its limited capacity for military industry?
